overview: Cynthia Warner joined Sapphire Energy in February 2009 as President. She brings more than 27 years of experience in the energy, refining and transportation industries. Using only sunlight, CO2 and non-potable water, Sapphire Energyâ€™s production of Green Crude is the environmental and economically wiser renewable option for replacing petro-based gasoline, diesel and jet fuel.
